Icon Classes¶

IconListManager¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Icons.IconListManager¶

Maintains a list of currently added file extensions

Public Functions

IconListManager (Windows.Forms.ImageList imageList, IconReader.IconSize iconSize)¶

Creates an instance of IconListManager that will add icons to a single ImageList using the specified IconSize.

Param imageList

ImageList to add icons to.

Param iconSize

Size to use (either 32 or 16 pixels).

IconListManager (Windows.Forms.ImageList smallImageList, Windows.Forms.ImageList largeImageList)

Creates an instance of IconListManager that will add icons to two ImageList types. The two image lists are intended to be one for large icons, and the other for small icons.

Param smallImageList

The ImageList that will hold small icons.

Param largeImageList

The ImageList that will hold large icons.

int AddFileIcon (string filePath)¶

Called publicly to add a file’s icon to the ImageList.

Param filePath

Full path to the file.

Return

Integer of the icon’s position in the ImageList

void ClearLists ()¶

Clears any ImageLists that IconListManager is managing.

Private Functions

void AddExtension (string Extension, int ImageListPosition)¶

Used internally, adds the extension to the hashtable, so that its value can then be returned.

Param Extension

String of the file’s extension.

Param ImageListPosition

Position of the extension in the ImageList.

IconReader¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Icons.IconReader¶

Provides static methods to read system icons for both folders and files. i.e.,

IconReader.GetFileIcon("c:\\general.xls");

Public Types

enum IconSize¶

Options to specify the size of icons to return.

Values:

Large¶

Specify large icon - 32 pixels by 32 pixels.

Small¶

Specify small icon - 16 pixels by 16 pixels.

enum FolderType¶

Options to specify whether folders should be in the open or closed state.

Values:

Open¶

Specify open folder.

Closed¶

Specify closed folder.

Public Static Functions

static Icon GetFileIcon (string name, IconSize size, bool linkOverlay)¶

Returns an icon for a given file - indicated by the name parameter.

Param name

Pathname for file.

Param size

Large or small

Param linkOverlay

Whether to include the link icon

Return

System.Drawing.Icon

static Drawing.Icon GetFolderIcon (IconSize size, FolderType folderType)¶

Used to access system folder icons.

Param size

Specify large or small icons.

Param folderType

Specify open or closed FolderType.

Return

System.Drawing.Icon
